/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling intersection in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The roads are teeming with cars and motorcycles, indicating a busy time of day. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the roads, their facades bathed in sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the various hues of the buildings and roads.
